title: Community’s ecological traits reflect spatio-temporal variability of climate change impacts
content:

Source: Environmental and Sustainability Indicators, Volume 23

Author(s): Julia Polo, Antonio Punzón, Manuel Hidalgo, Laurene Pecuchet, Marta Sainz-Bariáin, José Manuel González-Irusta, Antonio Esteban, Encarnación García, Miguel Vivas, Luis Gil de Sola, Lucía López-López
